name: Danger Zone (itch) (JERIC)
description:
Game plot

You are sent on a mission to infiltrate the base of enemy organization that is secretly conducting Experiment to create a  dangerous monster to take control the world. Your mission is to destroy all the laboratories where the experiment is conducting

Movement

A, D - Moving Player Horizonal

Left Mouse - Fire

W, S - Fire Up, And Fire Prone 

Space - Jump

In Air Space - Air Jump
